auth_errors.invalid_email_format: 📮 Hmm… that doesn’t look like an email.
auth_errors.restricted_characters: ⚠️ Only normal email letters, numbers, and symbols please.
auth_errors.user_not_found: 🤔 We don’t know this email yet. Wanna sign up?
auth_errors.wrong_password: 🙃 Wrong email or password. Try again?
auth_errors.user_disabled: 🚷 This account is taking a little nap. Contact us to wake it up.
auth_errors.too_many_requests: 🛑 Whoa! Too many tries. Take a 30-second break ☕
auth_errors.operation_not_allowed: 🚫 Signing in with Email and Password is not enabled.
auth_errors.network_request_failed: 📡 No WiFi? No problem — reconnect and try again!
auth_errors.unknown_error: 😵 Oops! Something went wonky. Try again.

onboarding.terms_and_privacy: By clicking log in, you agree with Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
